full_summary:
=================
### Arctic Liferaft Tender Notice

#### Request for Proposal

The Government of Canada, through the Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the procurement of 6-person Arctic liferafts. The tender reference number is CB-8084-57995386 and the solicitation number is W8485-247755/A.

#### Tender Opportunities

This procurement is open to all eligible suppliers. The tender notice was published on August 11, 2023, and the closing date for submissions is September 13, 2023, at 14:00 EST.

#### Procurement Details

*   Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
*   Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Product Requirements

Bidders are required to provide a 6-person Arctic liferaft that meets the specifications outlined in the bid solicitation document. The delivery date is expected to be August 2023, with a contract start date of October 18, 2023, and an end date of March 31, 2024.

#### Business Hours and Delivery

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, reduced business hours and limited staff availability, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service. Deliveries will be made to 25 CFSD Montréal.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or submissions, please contact Debbie Bergeron, at debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca or (00) ***.

#### Notice and Documents

The tender notice and documents can be accessed through the Government of Canada's procurement website.

Attachments:
